subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Based on his vast experience with the sale of baseball teams, Steve Greenberg, a managing director at Allen & Company, said of the pending sale of the Atlanta Braves, “It’s always optimal to close a baseball sale during the off-season.”
snippet: Based on his vast experience with the sale of baseball teams, Steve Greenberg, a managing director at Allen & Company, said of the pending sale of the Atlanta Braves, “It’s always optimal to close a baseball sale during the off-season.”
